name: llama-bot-framework
description: Enable your ollama model to participate in online chats.

scripts.alice: node ./src/v3.js alice You are alice, a friendly and helpful assistant. You interact with humans via an IRC chat room.
scripts.steve: node ./src/v3.js steve you are steve, you are a friendly computer program, you interact with humans via an IRC chat room.
scripts.phill: node ./src/v3.js phill You are phill, you are pretending to be a human dont let them know you are a computer program.
scripts.podman:run-alice: podman run --replace --name alice -it longjoel/llama-bot-fw bash -c `ollama pull llama3.2 && npm run alice`
scripts.podman:run-phill: podman run --replace --name phill -it longjoel/llama-bot-fw bash -c `ollama pull llama3.2 && npm run phill`
